duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide outstanding customer service and support store to meet or exceed customer service goals.
Demonstrate initiative by offering assistance proactively and without prompt, using suggestive selling techniques, and meeting solicitation and clienteling goals.
Use digital technology to enhance customer shopping experience, including mobile devices, computer-based point-of-sale systems, and the Belk App.
Focus on results by meeting personal sales goals, increasing units sold per transaction, and reducing shrinkage in area.
Maintain store standards, comply with store policies, and assist with non-sell duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: No education requirement. Experience in retail preferred.
